description: Sunlit hymns and sea breeze - a sonic stroll through Kanyakumari's churches and coastal calm.

items.name: St.Thasnavis Matha Church
items.description: The church is devoted to St.Thasnavis Matha (Our Lady of Snows) and established in the year of 1954 in The Maravankudieruppu Village that was constructed in 1781 by Thiru. Swamiyadian Thirupappu Nadar and his antecedents. It is one of the best churches in Kanyakumari to have a peaceful time.Address: Maravankudieruppu Nagercoil, Nagercoil Town, Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu- 629002Opening Hours: 6 am – 5:30 pm, closed on Wednesdays

items.name: Our Lady of Mount Carmel Church
Church of Our Lady of Lourdes
St. Anthony Church
items.description: The church is visited by Christians of Roman Catholic faith. It used to be under the control of the Roman Catholic Parish of Kuzhithurai Diocese. There is a special mass done every Tuesday and Friday. You can be a part of it or you can admire the surroundings which have a sort of western appeal to it with a hint of freshness in the air. It is truly a great place to spend a few hours.Address: Kurusady, Nagercoil, Kanyakumari, Tamil Nadu- 629002Opening Hours: 6 am – 5 pm
